common.name: Name
common.defaultRequiredFields: Please fill in mandatory fields marked with '*'

labels.defineUsers: Define User Privileges Roles and Groups

description.dataplane: Welcome to Hortonworks Data Plane. To start, please configure the LDAP properties and allow dataplane authenticate against it. Optionally, you can add Dataplane Administrators. Please proceed by clicking on GET STARTED
description.setupAuth: The first step is to help data plane connect to your LDAP by providing the LDAP configurations to Data plane.
description.defineUsers: Upon completing the LDAP configuration, you may add administrators to Data plane. You can add users or groups to data plane and assign or modify their roles anytime through the User Management Screen.
description.addCluster: Add Ambari Managed HDP clusters to Dataplane. Dataplane will auto-discover cluster information such as the cluster name, active services & important metrics running.
description.setService: Set up services to enable Dataplane to manage your data
description.addDataset: Create asset collection using Dataplane Steward Studio capability

labels.configError: Unable to save LDAP configuration. Please check and try again.

description.configurationDesctiption: The first step is to help Data Plane connect to your LDAP by providing the appropriate configurations.

labels.emptySearchResult: There are no clusters that match your search.

description.addCluster: Please add Ambari managed cluster to Dataplane. Dataplane will auto-discover cluster information such as the cluster name, active services & important metrics running.
description.datalake: This cluster has been identified as a Datalake since it has data management services,  {{serviceNames}} running.
description.clusterAddSuccess: Your cluster has been added to dataplane.
description.duplicateDataCenter: A cluster with the same name already exists in the given data center. Please select a different cluster, or specify a different data center name.
description.connectionFailed: Dataplane could not retreive cluster information.

connectionFailureReasons.ambariServerDown: Check if the Ambari server is up and running in the given url
connectionFailureReasons.insufficientAccessRights: Make sure that you have right access rights to the ambari server

description.userManagement: You can manage the users or groups added to Dataplane through User Management. This page is available for the Dataplane Adminsitrator. You can add new users or groups and assign them roles by clicking on ADD USER or ADD GROUP button. To activate/deactivate to edit their roles, click on the username in the list below or click on the menu icon on the displayed rows.

labels.creator: Creator
labels.name: Name
labels.emptySearchResult: There are no asset collection that match your search.

ds-editor.ds-description: Organize your data-assets including Hive & Hbase tables, HDFS Files into logical groups for subsequent usage.
ds-editor.tagDescription: Add tags to your asset collection for context and subsequent lookup
ds-editor.asset-description: Add related data assets into your asset collection, by searching across this Data-Lake

asset-search.noSearchMsg: Please search for assets above or use Advanced Search

asset-list.starAssetmessage: Few assets listed above already belong to asset collection, and cannot be used in any other asset collection

assets.add-assets-desc: Add related data assets into your workspace, by searching across the Data-Lake
